DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study Effect Intra-Dermal Insulin Injection Blood Glucose Levels After Eating
DOC.detailed_description: Previous study show intra-dermal ( ID ) insulin administration result rapid onset action comparison subcutaneous ( SC ) administration measure glucose infusion rate ( GIR ) glucose clamp conditions.The aim study investigate whether ID administration regular human insulin rapid-acting insulin analogue lead reduce postprandial glycemic excursion comparison SC application highly standardized experimental condition . Effects occurrence hypoglycemia also investigate , well pK pD comparison different insulin formulation administer ID . This mono-center , open-label , randomize , 5-period crossover study patient type 1 diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes 115 year , multiple daily injection ( MDI ) insulin pump ( CSII ) stable control HbA1c < = 9.0 % . Able attend clinic 5 different day BMI > 32 kg/m2 Evidence gastroparesis impair renal function lipodystrophy
